Package org.gamecontrolplus

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PCPconstants
    Some basic constants
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    This class is used to store configuration details for a control device.
    ControlButton
    This class represents a button of a device.
    ControlDevice
    The device class is for the communication with your input devices.
    ControlHat
    A ControlHat is a special button, that can be found on joypads and the top of joysticks for example.
    ControlInput
    Base class for input elements of a controller.
    ControlIO
    ControllIO is the base class for using controllers in Processing.
    ControlSlider
    The slider class is for analog input elements having a value range.
